DOC.brief_summary: This study aimed to measure, compare apelin, resistin, visfatin levels in patients underwent to RYGBP, LAGB and their relation with obesity.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Roux-en-Y Gastric Bypass Versus Laparoscopic Adjustable Gastric Band Operations on Resistin, Apelin and Visfatin Peptides
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis of morbid obesity Being underwent LAGB or RYGBP Having prior abdominal surgery history
